diff_act: 1.retrieve video torrents from multiple search engines
2.display the results in a user-friendly format
4.disable torrent searches in the search bar

regen.new_specification: The system shall display a no-results message when no torrent search results are found.
The system shall display a no-results message when no torrent results are found for the given query.

regen.absent_element: no-results message handling when torrent search is disabled
regen.new_specification: The system shall display a no-results message or an indication that torrent searching is disabled when the user attempts to perform a torrent search without having the tick box enabled.

label: If no results are found on a search it will display a message that No results were found for this search.
absence: situation of no results were found
